snippet.title: From Earth - Teaser Trailer (Free Half-Life 2 Mod)
snippet.description:
From Earth is a new sci-fi themed Source engine modification. The game recently came out on Steam as a free mod for Half-Life 2.

More Info: http://lambdageneration.com/modding/source/explore-the-year-3000-in-new-half-life-2-mod-from-earth/

Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/334370

Subscribe for more Half-Life goodness.
